12.content: Deploy enhanced V2 size bot to production
12.details: Replace current enhanced-size-bot with V2 version that includes alternative options, detailed body type analysis, and research-based measurements - competitive with or better than Lovable AI

13.content: Update Lovable integration to use V2 backend
13.details: Update Lovable's API calls to use the enhanced V2 backend that provides alternative options, detailed analysis, and professional measurements

14.details: Test V2 enhanced bot vs Lovable AI side-by-side to validate our competitive advantages and accuracy improvements
